00017 #define B3_CONTACT_SOLVER_INFO

00020 
00021 enum    b3SolverMode
00022 {
00023         B3_SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER = 1,
00024         B3_SOLVER_FRICTION_SEPARATE = 2,
00025         B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING = 4,
00026         B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS = 16,
00027         B3_SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING = 32,
00028         B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION = 64,
00029         B3_SOLVER_CACHE_FRIENDLY = 128,
00030         B3_SOLVER_SIMD = 256,
00031         B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS = 512,
00032         B3_SOLVER_ALLOW_ZERO_LENGTH_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS = 1024
00033 };
00034 
00035 struct b3ContactSolverInfoData
00036 {
00037         
00038 
00039         b3Scalar        m_tau;
00040         b3Scalar        m_damping;//global non-contact constraint damping, can be locally overridden by constraints during 'getInfo2'.
00041         b3Scalar        m_friction;
00042         b3Scalar        m_timeStep;
00043         b3Scalar        m_restitution;
00044         int             m_numIterations;
00045         b3Scalar        m_maxErrorReduction;
00046         b3Scalar        m_sor;
00047         b3Scalar        m_erp;//used as Baumgarte factor
00048         b3Scalar        m_erp2;//used in Split Impulse
00049         b3Scalar        m_globalCfm;//constraint force mixing
00050         int                     m_splitImpulse;
00051         b3Scalar        m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold;
00052         b3Scalar        m_splitImpulseTurnErp;
00053         b3Scalar        m_linearSlop;
00054         b3Scalar        m_warmstartingFactor;
00055 
00056         int                     m_solverMode;
00057         int     m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold;
00058         int                     m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
00059         b3Scalar        m_maxGyroscopicForce;
00060         b3Scalar        m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold;
00061 
00062 
00063 };
00064 
00065 struct b3ContactSolverInfo : public b3ContactSolverInfoData
00066 {
00067 
00068         
00069 
00070         inline b3ContactSolverInfo()
00071         {
00072                 m_tau = b3Scalar(0.6);
00073                 m_damping = b3Scalar(1.0);
00074                 m_friction = b3Scalar(0.3);
00075                 m_timeStep = b3Scalar(1.f/60.f);
00076                 m_restitution = b3Scalar(0.);
00077                 m_maxErrorReduction = b3Scalar(20.);
00078                 m_numIterations = 10;
00079                 m_erp = b3Scalar(0.2);
00080                 m_erp2 = b3Scalar(0.8);
00081                 m_globalCfm = b3Scalar(0.);
00082                 m_sor = b3Scalar(1.);
00083                 m_splitImpulse = true;
00084                 m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold = -.04f;
00085                 m_splitImpulseTurnErp = 0.1f;
00086                 m_linearSlop = b3Scalar(0.0);
00087                 m_warmstartingFactor=b3Scalar(0.85);
00088                 //m_solverMode =  B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING |  B3_SOLVER_SIMD | B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION|B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|B3_SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING;// | B3_SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER;
00089                 m_solverMode = B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING | B3_SOLVER_SIMD;// | B3_SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER;
00090                 m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold = 2;//unused as of 2.81
00091                 m_minimumSolverBatchSize = 128; //try to combine islands until the amount of constraints reaches this limit
00092                 m_maxGyroscopicForce = 100.f; 
00093                 m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold = 1e30f;
00094         }
00095 };
00096

00124 };
